******************** 提升算法测试案例 **************
（x',y'）|--> (x,y)

（x',y'）on E(Fp)
A8A92ED8560489E92612DD18E6DFF5B4CCBF24E2AE95CEA52F9AC2448C84C8E3
8F319D9184FEF8BC58DEE14BEFE308B218A7F1D8105F386258AAC0CB396F630D
S1)
x = x' mod p2
A8A92ED8560489E92612DD18E6DFF5B4CCBF24E2AE95CEA52F9AC2448C84C8E3
S2)
(x'^3 + ax' + b - y'2) mod p^2

p^2 =
FFFFFFFE00000000FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFE00000003FFFFFFFDFFFFFFFE0000000200000000FFFFFFFE0000000100000001FFFFFFFE0000000000000001
x'^3 =
7D16C772FA4D2919CE970E3DCDC44DC066214ED127ADCEF297CE2683CC7F62146DBD89361831FFDC9DD28520309F901787A9B74E63A88EAE5FA75CCB0956E253
ax' =
A8A92ED7AD5B5B10D00E532FC0CD189BE5DF2F2D392D7AEAD3A9988E8CDBB36C1009631FC20EA92D85DDE1D9E37B358D701965D6D22D8E4E4194F6EDCDECDC74
x'^3 + ax' =
25BFF64CA7A884299EA5616D8E91665C4C007E0060DB49D96B77BF14595B15827DC6EC53DA40A90923B066FC141AC5A3F7C31D2335D61CFEA13C53B8D743BEC6
x'^3 + ax' + b =
25BFF64CA7A884299EA5616D8E91665C4C007E0060DB49D96B77BF14595B1582A6B0E6F277E0073D710B0547E37FCF4BEB5AA7184B81AC917EF910FA24D7CD59
y'2 =
501877A6454593564E67BDD7E4F77E42605D8934BFEE4A3E2B8BCDE72F3FC7FED6B38F029B8D6B826FE79698B7B0AC75833888262ED9D977B5616130D5990EA9
(x'^3 + ax' + b - y'2) mod p^2
D5A77EA46262F0D4503DA395A999E819EBA2F4C9A0ECFF9F3FEBF12B2A1B4D81CFFD57F1DC529BBC01236EAD2BCF22D768221EF41CA7D317C997AFC94F3EBEB1
delta(P) = [ (x'^3 + ax' + b - y'2) mod p^2 ] / p =
D5A77EA5380A6F798848130F31E1FB291D84EFF394196E3736685036B0C1414F
S3)
fi(P) = delta(P) *(2y')^-1 mod p

(2y')^-1 mod p =
F8399A5AFDC47368BB4AF6F9B55AC505E442856C0BE64E3FF614ABDCDF066E1A
fi(P) = 
0F4D7496232418B40F97C272A5A420032394C7695CEFDF02BF054C847EADCD16

S4)
y = y' + fi(P)*p =
0F4D749613D6A41DEC73A9BE960C5D907DF0A7662A0DA3034E3EC963D334D6D36B29FE54E3EA38A20FEC073FE8297B2D356AA9DD321D267599A57446BAC195F7
************************************
output(x,y)= P‘
A8A92ED8560489E92612DD18E6DFF5B4CCBF24E2AE95CEA52F9AC2448C84C8E3
0F4D749613D6A41DEC73A9BE960C5D907DF0A7662A0DA3034E3EC963D334D6D36B29FE54E3EA38A20FEC073FE8297B2D356AA9DD321D267599A57446BAC195F7

***************** very point (x,y)is on E(Z/p^2Z)?
y^2 
25BFF64CA7A884299EA5616D8E91665C4C007E0060DB49D96B77BF14595B1582A6B0E6F277E0073D710B0547E37FCF4BEB5AA7184B81AC917EF910FA24D7CD59
x^3 =
7D16C772FA4D2919CE970E3DCDC44DC066214ED127ADCEF297CE2683CC7F62146DBD89361831FFDC9DD28520309F901787A9B74E63A88EAE5FA75CCB0956E253
a*x 
A8A92ED7AD5B5B10D00E532FC0CD189BE5DF2F2D392D7AEAD3A9988E8CDBB36C1009631FC20EA92D85DDE1D9E37B358D701965D6D22D8E4E4194F6EDCDECDC74
x^3 + ax
25BFF64CA7A884299EA5616D8E91665C4C007E0060DB49D96B77BF14595B15827DC6EC53DA40A90923B066FC141AC5A3F7C31D2335D61CFEA13C53B8D743BEC6
x^3 + ax + b mod p^2
25BFF64CA7A884299EA5616D8E91665C4C007E0060DB49D96B77BF14595B1582A6B0E6F277E0073D710B0547E37FCF4BEB5AA7184B81AC917EF910FA24D7CD59

y^2 = x^3 + ax + b mod p^2
output:
(x,y) on E(Z/p^2Z).

************ 计算[q]P' ********************
[q]P' = （x, y , z)
x = 
4789F04684CC88812B3465A27ED725108C44829B51C8591594CCD123DDD2A7917B05B45CA765049C6F22D8397004A2DFF4526CB522A066D94A6DD6E84166C9B4  (x坐标可以被p整除）

x / p
4789F046CC5678C7F78ADE6A7662037B02A686169BF8CF72B5922917BE99364C
